about_the_game:
This product requires Fantasy Grounds Unity
Gamemasters using this pack can create an endless supply of crests and heraldry. Add crests for nobles, knights and royal families for your players to encounter or use these to build up family crests for your heroes. It is also great for adding an extra heir of mystery for a villain.
Note: This pack requires Fantasy Grounds Unity.
This pack comes with all new art from Joshua Watmough to allow Gamemasters to create their own distinct family crests.
  • Use the tile tool to mix and match backgrounds for your crest
  • Use the tile or paint stamp tool to add decorative flourishes and elements to your crest that represent the family accomplishments or strengths
  • Use advanced brush techniques in Fantasy Grounds Unity to paint light and shadows over your final crest to give it extra dimension.
  • Use the paint stamping tool in FGU to add smoke, giant skeletal fossils and other decorations
Help Resources to Maximize use of this product can be found on the Fantasy Grounds wiki.

Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Joshua Watmough

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset. Requires Fantasy Grounds Unity
